jobDescription: Job Details  "Newly hired Clinical Lab Scientists will receive a $2000 bonus (grossed up). $500 will be paid at your 90 day mark of employment, another $500 will be paid at 6 months and the remaining $1000.00 will be paid at the end of one year of employment." Job Summary: Under general supervision and according to established policies and procedures, performs various clinical laboratory tests in one or more sections of the Laboratory in order to obtain data for use in diagnosis and treatment of disease  Hours: Full-time; 2pm-10:30pm various evenings during the week; Includes weekend/holiday rotation Required Education and/or Experience:An Associate's Degree or higher in Medical Technology or Clinical Laboratory ScienceRequired License/Certification:Registration with the American Society of Clinical Pathology (ASCP), National Credentialing Agency (NCA) or equivalent.
